com.jpmorgan.digital.service.impl

Class StockServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jpmorgan.digital.service.impl.StockServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StockService

    public class StockServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements StockService
    StockServiceImpl is the implementation of StockService class that provide definition of various operations that can be implemented on a stock The following operations can be executed on a Stock Instance:
    • Calculate Dividend Yield
    • Calculate P/E Ration
    • Record Trade
    • Calculate volume weighted stock price based on trades in past 5 minutes
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Aman Chhabra
